com.googlecode.routing.simulator
Class LinkTable

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.routing.simulator.LinkTable

public class LinkTable
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the set of information about the links to other routers that are connected to the one that owns this entity

Author:
Felipe Ribeiro, Michelly Guedes, Renato Miceli
